paragraph.heading: 1Deleting new metrics
paragraph.paragraph:
To delete a useless metric, you must have already clicked on
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_select_metrics_color.gif in the "Metric" tab of the context tool.

list.item: Click on "Save" to make deletion effective.
Click on "Exit" to hide the interface.

paragraph.warning: Caution: After you have saved, metric is definitely lost. If you have clicked on "delete" by mistake, do not save changes!
